subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: FIFA will back down from its ban on matches in La Paz, Bolivia’s capital. Sepp Blatter, the FIFA president, said he was responding to a request from Evo Morales, the president of Bolivia. Morales led a campaign to overturn a ban on international matches at altitudes of more than 8,200 feet. The ban was announced in May.
